basics.name: David Laing
basics.label: Cloud Infrastructure & AI Systems Engineer
basics.summary: Platform engineering leader with deep expertise in scaling distributed systems and AI infrastructure. Passionate about building observable, reliable systems that serve millions while maintaining operational excellence. Track record of designing large-scale API platforms, optimizing cloud infrastructure performance, and pioneering AI agent orchestration for complex systems. Thrives in high-trust, mission-driven environments where empirical approaches and long-term thinking create lasting impact. Brings unique combination of Python expertise, cloud platform mastery, and AI systems experience to help scale Anthropic's model serving infrastructure.

work.position: Staff Software Engineer - AI Infrastructure Lead
work.summary: Leading AI infrastructure and cloud platform engineering. Pioneered AI agent orchestration for Kubernetes/Terraform automation, building systems where AI agents collaborate to deploy and manage cloud infrastructure. Direct experience scaling AI workloads and optimizing cloud resource utilization.
highlights: Architected AI agent orchestration platform for infrastructure automation - creating self-healing, observable systems
Built and scaled cloud infrastructure on GCP and AWS, optimizing for performance and cost efficiency
Designed Python-based service mesh for AI agent communication and coordination
Implemented observability patterns for distributed AI systems using structured logging and metrics
Led migration of legacy systems to modern cloud-native architectures
work.name: Mechanical Orchard

work.summary: Maintained platform reliability for commerce systems serving 3 million merchants at massive scale. Established data reliability practices for 100PB data warehouse while ensuring system performance during peak traffic periods.
highlights: Scaled platform to handle $3.5M/minute peak traffic through performance optimization and capacity planning
Designed observability systems for 100PB data infrastructure using Python-based monitoring tools
Implemented SLI/SLO frameworks ensuring 99.99% availability for critical commerce APIs
Optimized resource utilization across Kubernetes clusters reducing infrastructure costs by 30%
Built Python automation tools for incident response and system recovery
work.name: Shopify Ltd

work.summary: Built data platform infrastructure and analytics pipelines serving VMware's entire R&D organization. Focused on Python-based data engineering and cloud platform optimization.
highlights: Designed Python data pipelines processing terabytes of telemetry data using dagster.io
Built distributed systems for cross-portfolio analytics on GCP infrastructure
Implemented performance optimization for BigQuery workloads reducing query costs by 40%
Created observable data platform architecture with comprehensive monitoring and alerting
work.name: VMWare Ltd

work.summary: Built and led SRE organization responsible for Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes platforms. Established reliability engineering practices across global engineering teams while maintaining production systems at scale.
highlights: Built SRE team scaling Cloud Foundry platform to thousands of production deployments
Designed large-scale API platform architecture serving 1M+ active users on pivotaltracker.com
Implemented Kubernetes orchestration patterns for multi-cloud deployments on AWS/GCP
Collaborated with Google SRE on error budget implementation and observability practices
Led performance optimization initiatives reducing platform latency by 50%
Mentored engineering teams on Python-based automation and infrastructure-as-code
work.name: Pivotal

work.summary: Building AI-powered decision systems using modern cloud infrastructure. Applying platform engineering principles to create scalable, observable systems.
highlights: Architected full-stack AI application using Python backend with TypeScript/React frontend
Implemented cloud-native deployment patterns on GCP with Kubernetes orchestration
Designed observable system architecture with comprehensive monitoring and alerting
work.name: Make Time Together Ltd

work.summary: Led cloud platform migration and established modern engineering practices. Built open-source log aggregation platform processing 2TB daily.
highlights: Architected LogSearch platform handling 2TB daily log ingestion for distributed systems
Led organizational migration to AWS cloud infrastructure
Implemented Python-based automation for infrastructure provisioning and deployment
Established engineering best practices including TDD and continuous delivery
work.name: City Index

education.summary: Strong foundation in computer science fundamentals, distributed systems design, and statistical analysis. Focus on building scalable, reliable systems.

publications.name: Scaling AI Infrastructure: Lessons from Production
publications.summary: Best practices for scaling AI workloads in production environments, focusing on observability, performance optimization, and resource management

publications.name: SRE & the Vulnerability Budget
publications.summary: Applying SRE principles to balance security, reliability, and feature velocity in large-scale systems

projects.name: AI Agent Infrastructure Platform
projects.description: Production platform for AI agent orchestration handling complex infrastructure automation tasks. Built with Python, focusing on observability, reliability, and scale.
highlights: Designed distributed system architecture for AI agent coordination
Implemented Python-based service mesh for agent communication
Built comprehensive observability with metrics, logging, and tracing
Achieved sub-second response times for infrastructure provisioning
Scaled to handle thousands of concurrent AI agent operations
